Olfactory tubercle Islets of Calleja spi.Synonym: Island of Calleja spiny granule neuron
Olfactory tubercle Islets of Calleja spi.Title: Granule cells of the olfactory tubercle and the question of the islands of Calleja
Olfactory tubercle Islets of Calleja spi.Definition: Granule cell found in the granule cell clusters (Islands of Calleja) in the olfactory tubercle characterized by a high density of dendritic spines (Millhouse, 1987)
